REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1966 reute d f BC-AUSIMONT-COMPO-<AUS> 04-01 0059

TEXT.TITLE: AUSIMONT COMPO <AUS> SELLS UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Ausimont Compo NV said it has sold the assets of its Equipment and Machinery Division for about six mln dlrs to an investment group including the unit's management, resulting in a modest pretax gain that will be included in first quarter results. The unit had sales of five mln dlrs in 1986. Reuter
